runs.comm: that was wide! Of Harmison proportions, goes all the way towards first slip and rolls away
spoons it towards mid-off but it drops short of the fielder
too wide of the off stump and Sehwag reaches out and slaps it hard past point, typical Sehwag

didn't take Australia too long to strike! Sehwag completely squared up outside the off stump, pacy delivery and he gets a thick leading edge that lobs to Hussey at first slip, Sehwag tries to work that to the on side
shuffles and he clips it towards square leg to get off the mark
that was well played, Gambhir gets width outside the off stump and he punches it neatly and bisects the gap at cover point, pierces the gaps between the fielders
nudges it off the hips down to short fine leg and they set off for a quick single
gets good turn, forces Gambhir is forced to adjust and cut it to short third man
gets down the track and lofts him over midwicket, couldn't find the boundary
stays back and pulls to square leg
turns and skids, Doherty posing some questions here, Kohli cuts
stays back and clips it against the turn to the on side and he has to scamper the single
down the leg side and he sweeps and Gambhir's a bit surprised that wasn't given a wide
Lee slides that one down the leg side and don't ask me why this wasn't given a wide!
down the leg side again and Kohli glances at the umpire, wide called this time
elegantly flicked away behind square on the on side, sign of a batsman in form
shuffles and tries to knock it to the on side again but the ball clips his hips and rolls aweay
cramps him for room but Gambhir softly taps it to the off side and takes a single, well done by the batsman
shot of intent from Kohli! Makes a hint of room and takes a pace down the pitch, gets under the bounce and lofts cleanly over long-on
a bit wide outside off and he punches it wide of mid-off
good running again, he squeezes out a yorker swinging in late to the off side and sets off for a quick single
clips it to the on side and they rotate the strike well
he picks a slower delivery from outside the off stump and mistimes the pull to the on side
short and wide and he reaches out and steers it to third man
excellent running by Kohli, he clips it in front of mid-on and puts pressure on the fielder
poor delivery and he punishes him for it, low full toss outside the off stump, he closes the face of the bat slightly and ensures he times the flick well past mid-on
chips down the track and mistimes it down to deep square leg
Gambhir makes room to a delivery swinging away and carves it over extra cover, just manages to find the boundary
very wide of the off stump but Gambhir chases it but can't beat backward point, packed off-sid field there
full on middle and off and he clips it elegantly towards deep midwicket
gives him width and he slices it to the off side, point slides and rebounds it to gully
stays back and clips it down to midwicket
round the wicket, shapes to cut but misses
tucks it towards short square leg and he takes a single
soft dismissal! Extra flight from Hussey, Gambhir makes a bit of room to carve it with the turn over the infield on the off side but he scoops it inside out to Marsh at cover
slides towards his body and he tucks it to the on side
continues round the wicket to the right-hander, Kohli tries to run it down the off side but misses
stays back and tucks it down to deep midwicket
drops it short and he thumps it down to long-on, Warner throws it over the keeper's head and they take the overthrow
tossed up on middle and leg and he clips it towards midwicket

Warner takes it at the edge of long-on! Hogg drops it a bit short and Kohli stays back and pulls, he realises instantly that he may not have got the required distance, Warner jogs back at long-on and doesn't have to look back, Hogg takes a wicket in his first over in his comeback
defended on the front foot, Raina playing safe after the fall of the wicket
tucks it off the front foot and the fielder at mid-on does well to slide and cut it off

Rohit falls first ball! Hussey bowls from round the wicket, bowls it flat and quick, lands on middle, spins towards the pads, he tries to tuck it but leaves a gap, the ball deflects off his pads and onto the stumps
full on the stumps and he clips it to mid-on
skids through outside off and Dhoni nearly edges it as he tries to cut
flatter delivery and he pushes it to long-on
flatter delivery and Raina comes forward and defends, the fall of wickets has halted India's plan of accelerating
comes forward and gets a leading edge to the off side
gets forward and clips it straight to midwicket
stays at the crease, waits for the turn and cuts just wide of point
goes back and cuts him down to point
spins it back in and Raina is cramped up, the ball clips his pads and then hits the bat and rolls to third man, Hogg appeals but that was missing off
pushes a single down to mid-off
comes down the track and takes a single to long-0n
turns and skids, Dhoni can only tap it to the off side
drifts inwards and he clips him towards midwicket
gets on his knee and thumps it past the non-striker and down to long-off
low full toss and he places it down to sweeper cover
low full toss down leg and he whams it down the leg side and down to fine leg, poor ball and punished
full on middle and leg and he places it to midwicket
stays back and cuts it to point
excellent fielding! Phew, Raina clubs a full toss down the ground and Hussey runs to his left at long-on and nearly pulls off a blinder on the dive, he saves a boundary though
driven straight to extra cover
turns and bounces and beats him, Dhoni truly foxed
short down the leg side and Raina swivels and pulls to fine leg, he controlled the shot
swings it inwards and he gets forward and taps it to the off side

not too sure where Raina was trying to hit that, he made room to a delivery angling across him from over the wicket, tried to swing him across the line instead of going over the off side, inside edge crashes onto the stumps
could have been six down! Dabbed it to the off side and set off for a single which was never there, the fielder's under-arm flick was wide at the batsman's end
nips it back in and Dhoni taps it back down the track
once again Dhoni cramped for room, he can only push it down the track
the slower ball and Jadeja swings at thin air, the ball kept a bit low
angles across him and he dabs it to the off side
Full and wide and Dhoni can only squirt it straight to mid-off, he really had to stretch
sprays it really wide outside off, he was bowling to an imaginary first slip
tucks it with soft hands towards mid-on and scampers the single, excellent fielding and back-hand flick by the fielder
stays back and steers it towards point
stays back at the crease and tucks it towards square leg
any boundary is like a mirage for India, exquisite timing, Jadeja opens the face and times it well and beats the gap at extra cover, beats the fielders
fuller delivery and he pushes it back to the bowler
another poor shot! Slower ball from round the wicket, Jadeja tries to loft him over the off side, miscues it and Warner runs forward from long-off and judges it well
slaps a wide delivery outside off and beats point, Lee does brilliantly to slide and cut it off just in front of the rope
tucks it towards midwicket and they take the first one hard, they throw to the wrong end
pitches outside leg and hits his pads and rolls away
chips down the track and pushes it towards mid-off
sharp turn inwards and Dhoni's caught unawares slightly and manages to defend
gets forward and pushes a single to cover
Ashwin chips down the track and neatly clubs him with the turn over midwicket, clean strike
chips down the wicket and lofts him over wide mid-off, Hussey runs across and cuts it off,,Australia have been superb on the field
Christian errs by bowling a full toss just above the waist height, Dhoni picks it early and clubs him over square leg, it's called a no-ball as well
tucks him down to deep midwicket for a couple
pushes it softly back to the bowler, tucked for room
take that! Christian bowls the slower ball and Dhoni picks that from the crease, fetches it from outside off and clubs it down to long-on, the fielder had no chance
stays back and tucks it with the angle to the on side
clips his pads and rolls to the on side as he tries to flick it away
ends the over with a dot ball as he pushes it down the track, a better over for India nevertheless
Ashwin goes right across his stumps to paddle it down to fine leg but the slower ball defeats him, he should give Dhoni the strike
full outside the off stump and he gets across and taps it to point
uses the crease and thumps it through the line down to long-off
full outside off and he squirts it out to long-off
doesn't pick the slower delivery and he swivels and tries to pull, the ball hits his pads and dribbles away
amazing bat speed! He picks a fractionally short delivery from outside off and clubs him over deep midwicket, all power
comes down the track and he checks his shot and plays it softly
comes down the track and forces a single to long-on
sprays it full and wide and he reaches out and squirts it out to the off side
low full toss and he pushes it down the track to long-on
full and wide outside the off stump and he chases it and places it to sweeper cover
full and straight and he takes a single to long-on, end of a very good over
full delivery on the off stump and he squeezes it out to mid-on
on the blockhole outside the off stump and Dhoni swings and misses, it's a wonder how the bat didn't fly away
on the blockhole outside off and Dhoni swings again, it flies off the toe of the bat down to long-off and he swivels at the crease with the momentum
Lee bowls to first slip again, funny old game for Lee
swings him to midwicket with one arm, sends Ashwin back and Lee breaks the stumps but he failed to gather the ball

it's a bird! It's a plane! No, it's a bat! It was always going to happen, Dhoni swings like there's no tomorrow and the bat lands somewhere near square leg, Lee was appealing for a caught behind but everybody was only gazing at the wooden flying machine
carbon copy of Dhoni's six to seal the World Cup, different scenario now, over long-on
makes room and he pushes it to long-on
low full toss and he forces it to long-off
squeezes out a yorker back to the bowler
tries to paddle it to fine leg and misses
on the blockhole and he squirts it out to mid-on
low full toss outside the off stump and he scoops it to wide long-off
